attributes.action: Ban all garden fires during Covid-19 epid as public need cleanest air in homes
attributes.additional_details: I work frontline NHS & I beg you to ban all garden fires, incl burning of garden waste, ban wood burning stoves during Covid-19 lockdown to give the public the best chance of fresh air circulation, esp for those at home and symptomatic. This is deadly and smoke can make, in particular, asthma sufferers worse. Other local councils are starting to ask the public but have not imposed a ban. With more people at home they are burning garden waste as something to do and it needs to stop!
attributes.background: To ban all garden fires, including burning of garden waste and ideally ban wood burning stoves during Covid-19 lockdown to give the public the best chance of fresh air circulation, especially for those at home and symptomatic. This is deadly and smoke can make even asthma sufferers worse
